meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent2: Oh begad, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent4: The thunder roared, begad, like a lion's roar.
meanings.sent5: His sudden appearance made me shout 'begad!'

meanings.sent1: He muttered a begad under his breath.
meanings.sent2: The begad slipped out in frustration.
meanings.sent3: She stubbed her toe and let out a loud begad.
meanings.sent4: The begad echoed through the room, full of anger.
meanings.sent5: The begad he uttered was filled with disappointment.

meanings.definition: An interjection used to show affirmation or agreement.
meanings.sent2: Yes, begad, I agree with you.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like music to my ears, begad.
meanings.sent5: Begad, I couldn't have said it better myself!
